dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') invoice_date, (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') invoice_number, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, (SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND rownum = 1) bl_num FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') invoice_date, NVL((SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER'), 'Data Missing in System') invoice_number, NVL(cv.charter_voyage_xid, 'Data Missing in System') booking_number, NVL((SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND rownum = 1), 'Data Missing in System') bl_num FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT obrn1.ob_refnum_value party, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn2.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn3.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn4.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn5.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn6.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn7.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn8.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || (SELECT country_name FROM country_code WHERE country_code3_gid = obrn8.ob_refnum_value) END) city_state_zip FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NOTIFY NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP COUNTRY CODE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL UNION SELECT NVL(obrn1.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') party, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn2.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE ((CASE WHEN NVL(obrn2.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn3.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn4.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END)) END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn5.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE ((CASE WHEN NVL(obrn5.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn6.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn7.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn8.ob_refnum_value,'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || (SELECT country_name FROM country_code WHERE country_code3_gid = obrn8.ob_refnum_value) END)) END) city_state_zip FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NOTIFY NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP COUNTRY CODE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(ssu.tag_3, 'Data Missing in System') ELSE ssu.tag_3 END) container_number, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')) END) unit_weight, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(COALESCE(obr2.remark_text,it.description), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE COALESCE(obr2.remark_text,it.description) END) description, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CASE WHEN obr1.remark_text IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr1.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')), '999,999,990.00')), '\s*', '') END ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr1.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')), '999,999,990.00')), '\s*', '') END) unit_price, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CASE WHEN obr1.remark_text IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3) * TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr1.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')), '999,999,990.00')), '\s*', '') END ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3) * TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr1.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')), '999,999,990.00')), '\s*', '') END) amount_due FROM shipment s JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_COMMODITY DETAIL' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL ORDER BY container_number ) a ORDER BY rnum

SELECT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN '$' || NVL(st.total_unadjusted_formatted, 'Data Missing in System') ELSE '$' || st.total_unadjusted_formatted END) sub_total, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN '$' || NVL(st.total_cost_formatted, 'Data Missing in System') ELSE '$' || st.total_cost_formatted END) tot_amount FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_TOTALS st ON st.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT adjustment_num, adjustment_description, adjustment_amount_formatted adjustment_amount FROM VIEW_SHIP_UNIT_ADJUST_DETAIL WHERE shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(adjustment_num, 'Data Missing in System') adjustment_num, NVL(adjustment_description, 'Data Missing in System') adjustment_description, NVL(adjustment_amount_formatted, 'Data Missing in System') adjustment_amount FROM VIEW_SHIP_UNIT_ADJUST_DETAIL WHERE shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
